detail_desc: Short dress in a patterned weave with a small stand-up collar and V-neck with ties at the front. Long sleeves with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the cuffs, and an elasticated seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, elasticated waist and high cut at the back.
Long, sleeveless dress in crinkled chiffon with a deep V-neck and wrapover front and back. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Satin lining.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and lined gusset. The briefs have a light shaping effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Baby Exclusive. Cap in a striped cotton weave with elastication at the back.
Sports socks in a cotton blend.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, straight-cut blouse in an airy organic cotton weave with a wide, stand-up collar that creates a draped effect. Buttons at the back, gathers on the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Extra-long, tapered sleeves with pin-tucks and wide, detachable cuffs. Pearly buttons. Rounded and longer at the back.
Short A-line dress in a cotton weave with gathered tiers on the skirt. Square neckline front and back and short puff sleeves with elastication at the shoulders and hems. Unlined.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Set with a sleeveless top and pair of shorts in an airy, viscose weave. Top with a round neckline, opening with a button at the back of the neck and tie-detail at the front hem. Shorts with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.

Blank Staples is a streetwear collection of minimalistic pieces that are the perfect canvas for your personal style and creativity. This contemporary, long-sleeved T-shirt is made from heavy, 240 gsm cotton jersey for a premium handfeel. In a straight cut and oversized for a relaxed fit, it has a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Sleeveless blouse in a soft viscose weave with a narrow collar, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.

Short, voluminous, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton blend with a gathered frill trim and narrow elastication at the top that continues over the arms. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps long, voluminous balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with fake buttons. Lined.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequined velour with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Jersey lining.
Long lace dress with a scalloped V-neck front and back, seam at the waist with a wrapover front and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey crêpe with a concealed zip in the side and straight-cut legs with sewn-in creases front and back.
Hat in a soft jacquard knit with a pompom on the top and a turn-up at the hem.

Dress in airy, patterned chiffon with flutter sleeves that continue back over the shoulders. Bodice with smocking at the front and a zip at the back. Tiered skirt with gathered seams and frill trims with overlocked edges. Lined.
Wide waist belt in a sturdy weave with a round, rattan-covered metal buckle. Width at the widest point 10 cm.
Suede hi-tops with zips in the sides and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Treggings in washed stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
Straight trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and armholes.
Short pyjama shorts in a cotton weave with narrow elastication at the waist and short slits in the hems.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and seam under the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Top in soft viscose jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow ties at the sides and a gathered seam at the back.

Pyjamas in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves with contrasting colour panels and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, side pockets and gently tapered legs with contrasting colour side stripes and ribbed hems.
Small suede shoulder bag with a flap and metal fastener and a metal chain shoulder strap. One inner compartment. Lined. Size 8x13x19 cm.
Short dungaree dress in soft cotton twill with buttons down the front, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and diagonal side pockets. Unlined.

Ankle-length jumpsuit in woven fabric with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Relaxed fit with a seam at the waist, detachable tie belt, patch front pockets and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed, ankle-length shaft with a reflective print. Ribbed section over the foot for optimum fit and comfort.
Straight-cut, V-neck dress in woven fabric with 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with a seam, pleats and flared cuffs. Lined.

Knee-length dress in washed denim with a square neckline, buttons at the top and short sleeves with elastication and a frill at the hems. Gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans with a regular waist, button fly and tapered legs with twisted, shaping seams.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and a placket with press-studs.
Set with a top and shorts in soft organic cotton jersey. Sleeveless, patterned top with a rounded, frill-trimmed hem. Shorts with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Short skirt in a woven Tencel™ lyocell blend with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Unlined.
Flip-flops with fabric straps and fluted rubber ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
No-show trainer socks in mesh with a silicone trim on the inside of the heels to hold them in place.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Boxy polo-neck jumper knitted in soft, fluffy chenille yarn with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying mesh with an elasticated drawstring waist. Unlined.
Large metal earrings with pendants made of plastic stones in various colours and sizes. Length approx. 12.5 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Small heart-shaped shoulder bag in faux fur with a zip at the top and a narrow grosgrain shoulder strap with a press-stud at one side. Lined. Size approx. 14x15 cm.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
All-in-one suit in soft organic cotton jersey with a jersey-lined hood with ears. Zip down the front, a front pocket with ear appliqués, and wide foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and skinny legs with seams.
Joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with lacing and elastication at the waist. Fake fly with a button, front and back pockets and tapered legs.

Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening at the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a gathered seam at the hips. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Set with a long-sleeved top and leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a round neckline and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Leggings with an elasticated waist and sewn-in creases at the front.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with decorative buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, gently flared skirt. Unlined.
One-shoulder body in ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Dress in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend containing some alpaca wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Relaxed-fit top in soft fleece with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a covered metal ring at the front of the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Blouse in an airy weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a gathered yoke on the shoulders and at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Suede biker jacket with notch lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped front pockets, a zip at the cuffs and a detachable belt. Lined.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorter top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem. Soft brushed inside.

Blouse in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck and concealed button at the neckline. Elasticated seam with decorative ties below the bust, gathers at the shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Zip down the front and along one leg, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems.
Top in softly draping viscose jersey with 3/4-length dolman sleeves, a decorative seam at the back and a rounded hem.
Cargo shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, leg pockets with a flap and button and slim legs.

Long-sleeved shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a button-down collar, chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
